Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2011 08:39PM dkerler wrote: Hi ladies. Just wanted to give you a few words of encouragement. I started chemo 2 years ago in January 2009 and am doing great. My hair came in curly but only lasted for 1 year. Now it is back to normal which is something I never thought I would say about any part of me again. I gained about 10 pounds during chemo but with exercise I lost it and haven't gained any more from taking Femara. Hang in there. We are strong and we are survivors! hugs to you all Debbie
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in January '11 JulieH leftfootforward
